resources.string: Congratulations, you\'ve found a bug with %1$s! We\'re sorry for the inconvenience, of course this shouldn\'t be happening with our app. Please send a bug report to %2$s to help us solve the issue!
Enter additional message below (what you were doing when the app crashed):\n
Are you sure you want to delete all the application logs? They don\'t take up much storage space, and are very helpful for monitoring activity and solving potential issues.
